text: Tony Lewis (21 December 1957 â€“ 19 October 2020) was an English pop rock singer-songwriter and bassist. He was a member of the band the Outfield, known for their hit single "Your Love". He released his first solo album, Out of the Darkness, in the spring of 2018 on Madison Records. His career began in 1984. He was born in London. Lewis died on 19 October 2020 in London at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:English rock singers Category:English rock musicians Category:Bassists Category:Musicians from London Category:Singer-songwriters from London
title: Tony Lewis (musician)
